text: Just may refer to: *Justice *"Just", a song by Radiohead from the 1995 album The Bends *Jordan University of Science and Technology *Just Music, a record label *Just Ella, a book written by Margaret Peterson Haddix *Just (band), a three-piece grunge band from Ireland ==People== *Hazel Just, a writer *Paul Just, a German-Canadian pole vaulter *Saint James the Just, an important person in early Christianity
title: Just
